Posts.EditableText:
So I tried to give my game a little test run, but instead it crashed and gave me this error;

```
Error launching game: Could not load file or assembly 'CefSharp.Core.dll' or one of its dependencies. The specified module could not be found.

Error launching game: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.

System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at TextAdventures.Quest.PlayerHTML._Closure$__87-0._Lambda$__1()
   at TextAdventures.Quest.PlayerHTML.ClearBuffer()
   at TextAdventures.Quest.Player._Lambda$__122-0()
```

Someone else had the same issue awhile back, I'll link it here ;  http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/-jkuhmhdhus5tjaxu0_cbw/error-with-new-version

I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, but the issue still persists. Anyone else have this issue, and if so, have any of you managed to solve it?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

Did you try downloading Quest again and installing from that newly downloaded **.exe** file?  (That has worked for someone before.)
Posts.HTML:
Hello.

Did you try downloading Quest again and installing from that newly downloaded .exe file? (That has worked for someone before.)

Posts.EditableText:
I have, and the issue still persists.

I made sure to uninstall it, download it again from the website, and reinstall it from the new .exe file.
